name: Inspiron 15
shortDescription: Compact and reliable laptop for daily use.
longDescription: Dell's Inspiron 15 is a popular choice for students and professionals, providing an Intel Iris Xe graphics card, fast 512GB SSD storage, and a sturdy build. It balances performance with portability.

name: MacBook Air
shortDescription: Lightweight and powerful Mac laptop.
longDescription: Apple's MacBook Air, powered by the M1 chip, offers excellent battery life, efficient performance, and a lightweight frame. This laptop is ideal for users looking for reliable performance in a portable form.

name: Pavilion Gaming Desktop
shortDescription: High-performance gaming desktop for beginners.
longDescription: HP's Pavilion Gaming Desktop is designed for those who want to start gaming with an NVIDIA GTX 1650 GPU and a combined SSD and HDD setup, offering fast load times and ample storage.

name: Legion 5
shortDescription: Powerful gaming laptop with smooth graphics.
longDescription: The Lenovo Legion 5 is built for gamers who need mobility and performance, with a powerful RTX 3060 GPU and 1TB SSD to handle demanding games and programs seamlessly.

name: ROG Strix G10
shortDescription: High-end gaming desktop for intense sessions.
longDescription: ASUS ROG Strix G10 is designed to provide a premium gaming experience with an RTX 2060 GPU and a sleek design. This desktop is equipped to handle high-resolution games and VR experiences.

name: IdeaCentre AIO 3
shortDescription: All-in-one desktop for families and home use.
longDescription: The Lenovo IdeaCentre AIO 3 is an all-in-one desktop that provides a clean, compact design and versatile performance for general use. Perfect for families who need a reliable computer for everyday tasks and light entertainment.

name: Aspire 5
shortDescription: Affordable and functional laptop for daily work.
longDescription: Acer Aspire 5 provides great value for budget-conscious users. With a solid Intel Core i5 processor, it is suitable for general computing, light gaming, and streaming.

name: Predator Orion 3000
shortDescription: Premium desktop for high-performance gaming.
longDescription: The Acer Predator Orion 3000 is built for serious gamers who require top-notch graphics, speed, and responsiveness. It features a robust cooling system and an RTX 3060 Ti for 4K gaming and VR.

name: Surface Laptop 4
shortDescription: Sleek and versatile laptop for professionals.
longDescription: Microsoft's Surface Laptop 4 is a slim, stylish laptop designed for productivity. With a sharp 13.5-inch touchscreen and fast AMD processor, it is ideal for multitasking and professional use.

name: Mac Mini
shortDescription: Compact desktop with powerful Apple M1 chip.
longDescription: The Mac Mini is Apple's compact desktop that packs the power of the M1 chip, offering efficient processing and graphics. Perfect for users needing a desktop with minimal footprint.

name: ThinkPad X1 Carbon
shortDescription: Ultra-light laptop designed for business professionals.
longDescription: Lenovo's ThinkPad X1 Carbon combines portability with power, offering a robust Intel i7 processor, long battery life, and a lightweight design. Perfect for users needing reliable performance on the go.

name: Alienware Aurora R12
shortDescription: High-performance gaming desktop with striking design.
longDescription: The Alienware Aurora R12 is a powerful gaming desktop designed for high-end gamers, featuring a unique case design, liquid cooling, and a strong RTX 3070 GPU capable of 4K gaming.

name: Surface Pro 7
shortDescription: Versatile tablet-laptop hybrid for flexible use.
longDescription: Microsoft Surface Pro 7 is a 2-in-1 device offering laptop power and tablet flexibility, with a crisp touchscreen display and advanced stylus compatibility for creatives and professionals alike.

name: HP Envy 13
shortDescription: Compact, premium laptop for productivity on the go.
longDescription: The HP Envy 13 offers a sleek, compact design paired with strong performance. With a high-resolution display and powerful i7 processor, it’s ideal for users seeking both style and substance.

name: Chromebook Flip C434
shortDescription: Versatile Chromebook with 360-degree hinge.
longDescription: The ASUS Chromebook Flip C434 features a 360-degree hinge, allowing for laptop, tent, and tablet modes. It’s perfect for students and professionals needing a lightweight, multi-functional device.

name: Acer Nitro 5
shortDescription: Affordable gaming laptop with solid performance.
longDescription: Acer Nitro 5 provides a great entry-level gaming experience with a GTX 1650 GPU, vibrant 15.6-inch display, and efficient cooling. It's ideal for gamers on a budget.

name: Dell XPS 13
shortDescription: Premium ultrabook with stunning 4K display option.
longDescription: Dell XPS 13 offers a high-end build with a near bezel-free 4K display, perfect for professionals needing both performance and portability in a premium design.

name: HP Omen 30L
shortDescription: High-performance desktop built for gaming and content creation.
longDescription: HP Omen 30L is a robust desktop with powerful specs, ideal for gaming and demanding content creation. With customizable RGB lighting and sleek design, it's a top choice for enthusiasts.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go
shortDescription: Lightweight, portable laptop for basic tasks.
longDescription: The Surface Laptop Go offers a compact and affordable option for students and light users. Its touchscreen and responsive keyboard make it great for on-the-go productivity.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i
shortDescription: Flexible 2-in-1 laptop with stunning 4K display.
longDescription: The Lenovo Yoga 9i offers high performance in a sleek 2-in-1 design with a 360-degree hinge, making it versatile for creative work, entertainment, and general use.

name: Razer Blade 15
shortDescription: Premium gaming laptop with high-end graphics.
longDescription: Razer Blade 15 is a top-tier gaming laptop featuring an RTX 2070 GPU and an ultra-thin, durable design. It’s ideal for gamers and creators seeking high performance in a portable machine.

name: Apple iMac 24-inch
shortDescription: Elegant all-in-one desktop with vibrant 4.5K Retina display.
longDescription: Apple's 24-inch iMac with the M1 chip offers brilliant colors, a sleek design, and powerful performance. Ideal for creative professionals or families looking for a stylish and capable computer.

name: ASUS TUF Dash F15
shortDescription: Durable gaming laptop with military-grade protection.
longDescription: The ASUS TUF Dash F15 is built to withstand tough conditions, providing reliable gaming performance with an RTX 3050 GPU and a lightweight, rugged design.

name: HP Spectre x360
shortDescription: Premium convertible laptop with high-end features.
longDescription: The HP Spectre x360 is a beautifully designed 2-in-1 laptop with powerful specs, security features, and long battery life, ideal for professionals and creatives.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book Pro 360
shortDescription: Ultra-slim convertible laptop with AMOLED display.
longDescription: Samsung Galaxy Book Pro 360 combines sleek portability with a vibrant AMOLED touchscreen, offering a premium experience for users who want flexibility and performance.

name: Acer Aspire 5
shortDescription: Affordable laptop with reliable performance.
longDescription: Acer Aspire 5 is a budget-friendly laptop suitable for everyday use, featuring a Ryzen 5 processor and decent graphics for smooth performance.

name: LG Gram 17
shortDescription: Ultra-light 17-inch laptop with long battery life.
longDescription: LG Gram 17 offers a large screen with an incredibly light build, making it easy to carry around while offering great performance and battery life.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro
shortDescription: High-performance gaming laptop with 16-inch QHD display.
longDescription: The Lenovo Legion 5 Pro is a powerful gaming machine with a 16-inch QHD display, giving gamers an immersive experience and high-quality visuals.

name: Dell Precision 5550
shortDescription: Workstation laptop for demanding professional workloads.
longDescription: Dell Precision 5550 is built for professionals who need top performance, ideal for tasks like 3D rendering, video editing, and heavy multitasking.

name: HP Pavilion x360
shortDescription: Convertible laptop with touchscreen and 360-degree hinge.
longDescription: The HP Pavilion x360 is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with touchscreen capabilities, suitable for work, entertainment, and creativity with flexible modes.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G15
shortDescription: High-end gaming laptop with RGB lighting and powerful specs.
longDescription: ASUS ROG Strix G15 is designed for gamers seeking top performance, equipped with an RTX 3070 GPU and customizable RGB lighting.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
shortDescription: Professional-grade laptop with exceptional performance.
longDescription: The MacBook Pro 16-inch with M1 Pro chip provides outstanding power and efficiency, making it ideal for professionals in creative fields like video editing and graphic design.

name: HP EliteOne 800 G6 All-in-One
shortDescription: All-in-one desktop with sleek design for office use.
longDescription: HP EliteOne 800 G6 is designed for office environments, offering a compact, all-in-one form factor with powerful specs for multitasking and productivity.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5
shortDescription: Budget-friendly convertible laptop for versatile use.
longDescription: The Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 offers a flexible 2-in-1 experience at an affordable price, making it a great choice for students and light users looking for both laptop and tablet modes.

name: Dell OptiPlex 7080 Micro
shortDescription: Compact desktop for office or small workspaces.
longDescription: The Dell OptiPlex 7080 Micro is a small but powerful desktop designed for office environments, saving space while delivering reliable performance.

name: Alienware Aurora R12
shortDescription: High-end gaming desktop with futuristic design.
longDescription: Alienware Aurora R12 provides top-tier gaming performance with an RTX 3080 GPU and liquid cooling. Perfect for gamers seeking the ultimate experience.

name: ASUS VivoBook 15
shortDescription: Budget laptop with reliable performance for everyday use.
longDescription: ASUS VivoBook 15 is ideal for students and light users, offering essential features and a lightweight build for easy portability.

name: Microsoft Surface Book 3
shortDescription: High-performance 2-in-1 laptop with detachable screen.
longDescription: Microsoft Surface Book 3 combines power with versatility, offering a detachable touchscreen for tablet functionality, perfect for creative professionals.

name: HP Envy Desktop
shortDescription: High-performing desktop for multitasking and gaming.
longDescription: The HP Envy Desktop is suitable for both work and entertainment, delivering solid performance for creative tasks and gaming at an affordable price.

name: Acer Swift 3
shortDescription: Slim, lightweight laptop with a powerful AMD processor.
longDescription: Acer Swift 3 provides impressive performance for its price and weight, making it an excellent choice for students and professionals on the go.

name: Dell Inspiron 14 5000
shortDescription: Affordable laptop with balanced performance for everyday tasks.
longDescription: The Dell Inspiron 14 5000 series offers a reliable experience for users, handling tasks like browsing, streaming, and basic productivity effortlessly.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9
shortDescription: Premium business laptop with robust security and build quality.
longDescription: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9 is a top choice for business professionals, featuring enterprise-grade security, a sleek design, and reliable performance.

name: HP ZBook Studio G8
shortDescription: High-performance mobile workstation for creative professionals.
longDescription: The HP ZBook Studio G8 offers powerful specs with workstation graphics, making it ideal for 3D modeling, video editing, and complex simulations.

name: ASUS ZenBook Flip 14
shortDescription: Convertible laptop with powerful specs and discrete graphics.
longDescription: ASUS ZenBook Flip 14 is a stylish, high-performance 2-in-1 laptop, great for users who need both versatility and a bit more graphical power.

name: Razer Blade Stealth 13
shortDescription: Compact gaming laptop with stunning 4K display option.
longDescription: Razer Blade Stealth 13 offers excellent performance in a small form factor, suitable for users who want both portability and gaming capability.

name: Apple Mac Mini M1
shortDescription: Compact desktop with Apple’s M1 power.
longDescription: Apple Mac Mini M1 is a powerful, space-saving desktop with Apple's new M1 chip, offering efficient performance in a compact design for home or office.

name: Samsung Chromebook 4
shortDescription: Compact Chromebook for lightweight web-based tasks.
longDescription: Samsung Chromebook 4 is an affordable, portable option ideal for students and light browsing with web applications.

name: Microsoft Surface Studio 2
shortDescription: All-in-one creative desktop with stunning 28-inch touchscreen.
longDescription: Microsoft Surface Studio 2 is perfect for artists and designers, featuring a large, touch-sensitive display and performance tailored to creative applications.

name: Dell XPS Desktop
shortDescription: Stylish and powerful desktop for home or office.
longDescription: The Dell XPS Desktop combines a sleek design with impressive power, offering a great balance for work, productivity, and entertainment.

name: HP Spectre x360 14
shortDescription: Premium 2-in-1 laptop with stunning OLED display option.
longDescription: HP Spectre x360 14 is a luxurious 2-in-1 laptop featuring excellent build quality, an OLED display, and a design that suits professionals and creatives alike.
